meanings.definition: a substance that modifies the immune response
meanings.sent1: The immunomodulator helped boost my body's defenses against germs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed an immunomodulator to regulate my immune system.
meanings.sent3: The immunomodulator and the virus had a dance-off in my body.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like an immunomodulator, spreading joy and positivity.
meanings.sent5: The immunomodulator acted like a shield, protecting me from getting sick.

meanings.definition: a drug that regulates the immune system
meanings.sent1: After taking the immunomodulator, my immune system felt more balanced.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended an immunomodulator to help control my immune response.
meanings.sent3: The immunomodulator and antibiotics teamed up to fight off the infection.
meanings.sent4: Her care was an immunomodulator, soothing my worries and fears.
meanings.sent5: The immunomodulator was like a conductor, orchestrating my body's defenses.

meanings.definition: a compound that alters the functioning of the immune system
meanings.sent1: The immunomodulator changed how my immune system reacted to allergens.
meanings.sent2: Researchers are studying a new immunomodulator to understand its effects on immunity.
meanings.sent3: The immunomodulator and the immune cells played a game of chess in my body.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an immunomodulator, influencing my thoughts and actions.
meanings.sent5: The immunomodulator acted like a switch, turning on my body's defenses when needed.
